title: I feel like garen does too much
body: For how easy he is... I get new players need a champ to play but it kinda annoys me.

You've accidentally discovered how League of Legends skill-caps work. People complain about balance, but all champions are about the same.

+ The problem is some champions like Lee Sin, Thresh and Zed have very high skill-caps. So to use them to their fullest potentional, you need to be skilled. Garen though, takes almost no skill. 

 A Silver Garen player, has the same physical mechanics **on Garen** as a Diamond Garen player. What sets them apart is decision making and CS.

 So when that Garen runs at you, he's using his champion to it's highest potential, because the skill-cap is so low. That's what makes him effective.

 The trade off is that, Garen has very limited options. If running at the enemy isn't working, he's a little screwed, while Zed has almost limitless options.

This is why League coaches advise low elo players to play low skill-cap champions. All that being said, Garen is a little strong right now, but it's not insanely out of balance. He'll be almost as effective even if he is nerfed a bit.
